apartments.title: 3-Room Apartment
apartments.description: A spacious and comfortable 3-room apartment located in the city center of Baku.
apartments.rules: No pets allowed, Smoking is prohibited

apartments.title: 2-Room Apartment
apartments.description: A clean and cozy 2-room apartment, ideal for families.
apartments.rules: Daily cleaning services are available for an additional fee.

apartments.title: 4-Room Apartment
apartments.description: A large and spacious 4-room villa located on the outskirts of Baku. Includes a pool and garden.
apartments.rules: Cleaning service is provided every 3 days.
